CENTILI_USER.description: The username for basic auth. CENTILI_PASS must also be set if used. Leave empty to disable.

CENTILI_PASS.description: The password for basic auth. CENTILI_USER must also be set if used. Leave empty to disable.

CENTILI_PROXY_USER.description: The username of the proxy server. Leave empty to disable.

CENTILI_PROXY_PASS.description: The password of the proxy server. Leave empty to disable.

CENTILI_PROXY_TYPE.description: The type of the proxy server. For example "socks5". Leave empty to disable.

CENTILI_PROXY_LOC.description: The location of the proxy server (host or ip). Leave empty to disable.

CENTILI_ALT_TW.description: The site to use as a replacement for twitter.com when site alternatives are enabled in the config.

CENTILI_ALT_YT.description: The site to use as a replacement for youtube.com when site alternatives are enabled in the config.

CENTILI_ALT_IG.description: The site to use as a replacement for instagram.com when site alternatives are enabled in the config.

CENTILI_ALT_RD.description: The site to use as a replacement for reddit.com when site alternatives are enabled in the config.
